record.methods:
PROCEDURE _open LOCAL lnCom WITH This lnCom = VAL(oRes.GetParam([KKM],[COM],lcIniFileName)) && íîìåð COM-ïîðòà
IF !.PortOpen AND lnCom >0 &&._comport > 0 .CommPort = lnCom &&._comport TRY .PortOpen = .T. CATCH *WAIT WINDOW ._comport NOWAIT ENDTRY ENDIF
.Refresh()
ENDWITH ******************************************************************************* ********************************* END METHOD ********************************** *******************************************************************************
ENDPROC PROCEDURE _write LPARAMETERS lcOutStr *28.04.2006 11:17 ->Îáúÿâëåíèå è èíèöèàëèçàöèÿ ïåðåìåííûõ LOCAL lnSeconds, ; lcReadStr, ; lcBuffer *** lnSeconds = SECONDS() lcReadStr = [] *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
WITH This
.OutBufferSize = 1
DO WHILE .T. &&SECONDS()-lnSeconds<=0.250 *** .Output(lcOutStr) IF !EMPTY(ALLTRIM(lcBuffer)) OR ALLTRIM(lcBuffer)<>CHR(13) lcReadStr=lcReadStr+lcBuffer ELSE IF ALLTRIM(lcBuffer)=CHR(13) .Input() RETURN lcReadStr ENDIF ENDIF *** ENDDO
RETURN [:ERROR]
ENDWITH ******************************************************************************* ********************************* END METHOD ********************************** ******************************************************************************* ENDPROC

PROCEDURE _close IF THIS.PortOpen THIS.PortOpen = .F. ENDIF THIS.REFRESH()
ENDPROC PROCEDURE _open WITH This
IF !.PortOpen AND ._comport > 0 .CommPort = ._comport TRY .PortOpen = .T. CATCH *WAIT WINDOW ._comport NOWAIT ENDTRY ENDIF
*.Refresh()
ENDWITH ******************************************************************************* ********************************* END METHOD ********************************** *******************************************************************************
ENDPROC
record.reserved3: _comport Ñâîéñòâî èñïîëüçóåòñÿ Ìåòîäîì _Open baudrate 0ñêîðîñòü îáìåíà *_open Îòêðûòü ïîðò *_close Çàêðûòü ïîðò *_read Ìåòîä ÷òåíèÿ èç ïîðòà (îïðåäåëÿåòñÿ ïðèëîæåíèåì) *_write Ìåòîä çàïèñè â ïîðò (îïðåäåëÿåòñÿ ïðèëîæåíèåì) *cancelcheck ñáðîñ äîêóìåíòà *checkdiscount ñêèäêà íà âåñü ÷åê *checksalereturn *checksalestorno *checksaletrans *closecheck *closeshift *continueprint *feeddocument *opendrawer *printheader *reportx

record.properties: Height = 48 Width = 58 cbindobj = prefix = suffix = Name = "olecommscanner"
record.methods:
PROCEDURE _open DODEFAULT() LOCAL lcComSet lcComSet = ALLTRIM(oRes.GetParam([SCANNER],[COMSET])) IF lcComSet = '0' this.Enabled=.f. RETURN ENDIF this.Settings = lcComSet IF this.Settings <> lcComSet MESSAGEBOX('Ñòðîêà íàñòðîéêè ïîðòà ñêàíåðà ñîäåðæèò îøèáêó.',0+64,'Ñîîáùèòå àäìèíèñòðàòîðó') ENDIF WAIT WINDOW this.Settings NOWAIT
ENDPROC PROCEDURE _read *28.04.2006 11:17 ->Îáúÿâëåíèå è èíèöèàëèçàöèÿ ïåðåìåííûõ LOCAL lnSeconds, ; lcReadStr, ; lcBuffer,; lnLen *** lnSeconds = SECONDS() lcReadStr = [] lnLen = 0 *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
WITH This
.InputLen = 1 DO WHILE lnLen<25 OR SECONDS()-lnSeconds<=1.2 &&0.250 *** lcBuffer = .Input() **WAIT WINDOW IIF(lcBuffer =CHR(13),'enter',lcBuffer ) ** IF !EMPTY(ALLTRIM(lcBuffer)) AND (ALLTRIM(lcBuffer)<>CHR(13) AND lcBuffer <> .suffix AND lcBuffer <> .prefix ) IF !EMPTY(ALLTRIM(lcBuffer)) AND (ALLTRIM(lcBuffer)<>CHR(13)) lcReadStr=lcReadStr+IIF(VAL(lcBuffer)=0 AND lcBuffer<>'0','',lcBuffer ) **WAIT WINDOW lcReadStr ELSE IF ALLTRIM(lcBuffer)=CHR(13) OR lcBuffer = .suffix .Input() WAIT WINDOW lcReadStr NOWAIT RETURN lcReadStr ENDIF ENDIF lnLen = lnLen + 1 *** ENDDO
x = SUBSTR(lcReadStr,15,1) RETURN [0000]
ENDWITH ******************************************************************************* ********************************* END METHOD ********************************** ******************************************************************************* ENDPROC PROCEDURE Destroy This._Close()
*25.04.2006 10:37 ->Âûïîëíèì ìåòîä ðîäèòåëüñêîãî êëàññà DODEFAULT() *------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ENDPROC PROCEDURE Init *25.04.2006 10:37 ->Âûïîëíèì ìåòîä ðîäèòåëüñêîãî êëàññà DODEFAULT() *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*04.07.2006 19:31 ->Îòêðûâàåì ïîðò This.OpenCom() *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
******************************************************************************* ********************************* END METHOD ********************************** ******************************************************************************* ENDPROC PROCEDURE OnComm *** ActiveX Control Event ***
*28.04.2006 11:24 ->Îáúÿâëåíèå è èíèöèàëèçàöèÿ ïåðåìåííûõ LOCAL lcObjectNM, ; lcMsg *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
WITH This
*12.05.2006 09:37 ->Ïîëó÷èì èìÿ îáúåêòà äëÿ ââîäà DO CASE CASE !EMPTY(.cBindObj) lcObjectNM = .cBindObj OTHERWISE RETURN ENDCASE *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*12.05.2006 09:36 ->×èòàåì êîä lcMsg = ._Read() *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*12.05.2006 09:40 ->Ïîêàçûâàåì ïîëó÷åííûé êîä &lcObjectNM..cBarCode = [] *&lcObjectNM..Refresh()
&lcObjectNM..cBarCode = lcMsg &lcObjectNM..Refresh() &lcObjectNM..SetFocus() *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ENDWITH ******************************************************************************* ********************************* END METHOD ********************************** ******************************************************************************* ENDPROC PROCEDURE opencom *28.04.2006 11:54 ->Ïîëó÷èì íîìåð COM-ïîðòà IF TYPE([oRes]) == [O] This._ComPort = VAL(oRes.GetParam([SCANNER],[COM])) ENDIF *------------------------------------------------------------------------------ IF This._ComPort = 0 this.Enabled = .f. RETURN ENDIF
*28.04.2006 11:54 ->Îòêðûâàåì ïîðò This._Open() *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
******************************************************************************* ********************************* END METHOD ********************************** ******************************************************************************* ENDPROC
record.reserved3: cbindobj prefix ÷òî ñòîèò äî øòðèõ-êîäà suffix ÷òî ñòîèò ïîñëå øòðèõ-êîäà *opencom

record.methods:
PROCEDURE _read *28.04.2006 11:17 ->Îáúÿâëåíèå è èíèöèàëèçàöèÿ ïåðåìåííûõ LOCAL lnLen, ; lcReadStr, ; lcBuffer *** lnLen = 1 lcReadStr = [] *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
WITH This
.InputLen = 1
DO WHILE lnLen<1000 *** lcBuffer = .Input IF !EMPTY(ALLTRIM(lcBuffer)) OR ALLTRIM(lcBuffer)<>CHR(13) lcReadStr=lcReadStr+lcBuffer lnLen=1 ELSE IF ALLTRIM(lcBuffer)=CHR(13) .Input DO CASE CASE SUBSTR(lcReadStr,1,4)=[Em-M] lcReadStr = SUBSTR(lcReadStr,17,9) CASE SUBSTR(lcReadStr,1,4)=[Mifa] lcReadStr = SUBSTR(lcReadStr,8,8) CASE SUBSTR(lcReadStr,1,7)=[No card] **MESSAGEBOX('Ïîëîæèòå êàðòó íà ñ÷èòûâàòåëü',0+48,'Ñ÷èòûâàòåëü íå âèäèò êàðòó',2500) lcReadStr = [] ENDCASE RETURN lcReadStr ENDIF ENDIF lnLen = lnLen+1 *** ENDDO
=MESSAGEBOX ("Timeout!",0,"Error") RETURN []
ENDWITH ******************************************************************************* ********************************* END METHOD ********************************** ******************************************************************************* ENDPROC PROCEDURE Destroy This._Close()
*25.04.2006 10:37 ->Âûïîëíèì ìåòîä ðîäèòåëüñêîãî êëàññà DODEFAULT() *------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ENDPROC PROCEDURE Init *25.04.2006 10:37 ->Âûïîëíèì ìåòîä ðîäèòåëüñêîãî êëàññà DODEFAULT()
*------------------------------------------------------------------------------ *28.04.2006 11:54 ->Ïîëó÷èì íîìåð COM-ïîðòà IF TYPE([oRes]) == [O] This._ComPort = VAL(oRes.GetParam([PROX],[COM])) ENDIF *------------------------------------------------------------------------------ IF This._ComPort = 0 this.Enabled = .f. RETURN
ENDIF *28.04.2006 11:54 ->Îòêðûâàåì ïîðò This._Open() *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
******************************************************************************* ********************************* END METHOD ********************************** ******************************************************************************* ENDPROC PROCEDURE OnComm *** ActiveX Control Event ***
*28.04.2006 11:24 ->Îáúÿâëåíèå è èíèöèàëèçàöèÿ ïåðåìåííûõ LOCAL lcObjectNM, ; lcMsg *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
WITH This *12.05.2006 09:37 ->Ïîëó÷èì èìÿ îáúåêòà äëÿ ââîäà DO CASE CASE PEMSTATUS(This.Parent,[cProxBind],5) AND !EMPTY(This.Parent.cProxBind) lcObjectNM = This.Parent.cProxBind CASE !EMPTY(.cBindObj) lcObjectNM = .cBindObj OTHERWISE RETURN ENDCASE *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*12.05.2006 09:36 ->×èòàåì êîä lcMsg = ._Read() *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*12.05.2006 09:40 ->Ïîêàçûâàåì ïîëó÷åííûé êîä &lcObjectNM..Value = [] &lcObjectNM..Refresh()
&lcObjectNM..Value = lcMsg &lcObjectNM..Refresh() &lcObjectNM..SetFocus() *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
*28.04.2006 13:01 ->Ïîëó÷åíî 13 ñèìâîëîâ è ðàçðåøåíî àâòîìàòè÷åñêîå ñîõðàíåíèå - ñîõðàíÿåì ïîëó÷åííûé êîä IF .lAutoSave AND LEN(ALLTRIM(lcMsg))>1 AND PEMSTATUS(This.Parent,[_HandleCntCancelSaveEvent],5) This.Parent._HandleCntCancelSaveEvent([OK]) ENDIF *------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ENDWITH ******************************************************************************* ********************************* END METHOD ********************************** ******************************************************************************* ENDPROC
record.reserved3: lautosave ðàçðåøåíî àâòîìàòè÷åñêîå ñîõðàíåíèå(ïîäòâåæäåíèå ââîäà) cbindobj ñâÿçàííûé îáåêò äëÿ ââîäà
